mapper.sql: id AS "id", di_opertype AS "diOpertype", di_batch AS "diBatch", di_updatetime AS "diUpdatetime", plant AS "plant", mtl_no AS "mtlNo", mtl_nodes AS "mtlNodes", mtl_type AS "mtlType", delflagforclientmtl AS "delflagforclientmtl", measurebaseunit AS "measurebaseunit", industrystnddes AS "industrystnddes", pagefromat AS "pagefromat", isconfflag AS "isconfflag", datauser AS "datauser", purgrp AS "purgrp", procuretype AS "procuretype", specprocuretype AS "specprocuretype", mrpcontroller AS "mrpcontroller", valctg AS "valctg", croplant AS "croplant", sizes AS "sizes", spmtlstatus AS "spmtlstatus"
mapper.select:
select
from faw_mtl_info where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and di_opertype like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diOpertype},'%')
and di_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diBatch},'%')
and di_updatetime like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diUpdatetime},'%')
and plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and mtl_no like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mtlNo},'%')
and mtl_nodes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mtlNodes},'%')
and mtl_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mtlType},'%')
and delflagforclientmtl like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.delflagforclientmtl},'%')
and measurebaseunit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.measurebaseunit},'%')
and industrystnddes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.industrystnddes},'%')
and pagefromat like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pagefromat},'%')
and isconfflag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.isconfflag},'%')
and datauser like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.datauser},'%')
and purgrp like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.purgrp},'%')
and procuretype like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.procuretype},'%')
and specprocuretype like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.specprocuretype},'%')
and mrpcontroller like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mrpcontroller},'%')
and valctg like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.valctg},'%')
and croplant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.croplant},'%')
and sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
and spmtlstatus like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.spmtlstatus},'%')
